publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1912.3 Tommy Sheridan: Impact of European Union on Scotlandâ€”As an amendment to motion (S1M-1912) in the name of Mr Jack McConnell, insert at end "regrets, however, that the UK Government is still blocking the European Directive on Consultation and Information to Workers which helped lose the jobs of Motorola workers in Bathgate."
